column6: "THE PEOPLE PLAYED BY GAMES!" Torn between her loyalties to Kaine and the Black Tarantula, Spider-Girl finally confronts Lady Octopus in a final battle.
column8: | inker:Sal Buscema | writer:Tom DeFalco | penciller (cover):Ron Frenz | colorist:Gotham Entertainment Group | penciller:Patrick Olliffe | letterer:Dave Sharpe
